item.title: EP 63 - Deadly Cults: The Restoration
item.itunes:title: Deadly Cults: The Restoration
item.description:
Today we visit Uganda to learn about one of the deadliest cults in modern times. Then we go back stateside to New Mexico to unearth a horrifying cult who have already killed a young child.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Links:

Movement For The Restoration Of the Ten Commandments Of God

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Movement_for_the_Restoration_of_the_Ten_Commandments_of_God

A Christian doomsday cult in Uganda

http://www.religioustolerance.org/dc_rest.htm

Muslim extremist father grins as his family is FREED on bail - despite claims his son died in ritual to resurrect him as Jesus and 11 kids found at his compound were training to be school shooters

http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-6057933/Family-child-died-ritualistic-exorcism-expected-resurrected.html

Feds Take Custody of New Mexico Muslim Cult Leader After Judge Orders Release on Bond

https://www.breitbart.com/national-security/2018/08/15/feds-take-custody-of-new-mexico-muslim-cult-leader-after-judge-orders-release-on-bond/

Judge in N.M. compound case threatened after ordering release of Muslim family

https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/2018/08/14/judge-new-mexico-compound-case-threatened-after-releasing-muslim-family/993139002/

New Mexico compound suspects were on a violent mission, prosecutors say. But the defense sees it differently.

https://www.cnn.com/2018/08/13/us/new-mexico-compund-suspects/index.html

Imam says he helped lead police to his son on New Mexico compound

https://www.cnn.com/2018/08/09/us/imam-siraj-wahhaj-speaks-new-mexico-compound/index.html

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2020
